Title: Relates to establishing a tax credit for electric vehicle charging stations task force
Summary: Establishes a tax credit for electric vehicle charging stations task force to recommend a program for a tax credit for commercial property owners who install electric vehicle charging stations on such property.
ActClause: AN ACT to establish a tax credit for electric vehicle charging stations task force to recommend a program for a tax credit for commercial property owners who install electric vehicle charging stations on such property; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
